entry.title: I know no peace
entry.summary:
Author: Katherine_Adhara

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,403Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 2

Summary: I remember the golden glint of morning light on his hair, cold winter days in the woods. I remember the reflection of the blue sky in his eyes, serene winds, fraught moments and the deafening sound of waves. I know no warmth, I know no peace. I am but a footnote, the last relic of a time lost to time, there is no today, there is no tomorrow, there is no yesterday. What are we if not the collection of memories and experiences of those we have loved and who have loved us, the amalgamation of the love we were born into, and if not, of the love we found and cherished; they still exist, for I have written their names on every paper, wall, leaf, the skin I walk around in, on the earth around the lake that keeps them from me for eternity. If no one knows me, if all those that have uttered my name aloud, or in their hearts; have known me in any way, are gone, never to come back. I am no more. Still, I endure, for this is my punishment. No young man, no matter how great, can know his destiny; he cannot glimpse his part in the great story that is about to unfold; like everyone, he must live and learn, and so it will be.
